sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_18948
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 820
Requirement is not verified The signal DI_ETH_WAKEUP shall be used as a input to detect if the OBD activation line is active. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_18948 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_23019
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/c/src/hal_base.c line 76 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/c/src/hal_base.c line 749 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/c/src/hal_base.c line 765 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/c/inc/hal_base.h line 710 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/c/inc/hal_base.h line 745
Requirement is not verified The software shall set DO_LINx_SLP to high at least 50µs after POWER ON Reset for all defined LINs 5,7. Sequence ==> Low ==> High (>=50µs) ==> Low Note: The sequence is needed to prevent a static low at singnal LIN_WAKE_UP_RXD after POWER ON Reset. All defined LINs refer to used/unused LINs: -Lin 5,7 are unused; -Lin 1..4,6 are used; ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_23019 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_18926
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/c/inc/hal_base.h line 396 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/src/hal_variant.c line 182 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal.h line 134 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 947
Requirement is not verified After the LIN bus goes to sleep and before the Chorus ECU goes to standby the LIN transceiver shall be set to sleep mode. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_18926 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_19868
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/c/inc/hal_base.h line 433 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal.h line 207 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 571 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 602
Requirement is not verified For ICAS1evo, when the LIN transceiver is in "sleep mode" the ECU shall detect a LIN network wake-up event triggered by a falling edge on “DI_LINx_RXD". ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_19868 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_18931
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 570 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 601 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 882
Requirement is not verified For ICAS1evo we have the following configurations for LIN: The signal DI_LINx_RXD shall be used to receive data The signal DO_LINx_TXD shall be used to transmit data The signal DO_LINx_NSLP shall be used to switch between Normal Mode and Sleep Mode. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_18931 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_19869
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/c/inc/hal_base.h line 434 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal.h line 208 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 200 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 233 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 572 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 603 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/Evo/inc/hal_variant.h line 883
Requirement is not verified For ICAS1evo, when the CAN transceiver is in "stand-by mode" the ECU shall detect a CAN network wake-up event triggered by a falling edge on the “DI_CANx_RXD” signal. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_19869 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_19870
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HAL/c/inc/hal_base.h line 397
Requirement is not verified For ICAS1evo, in order to control the standby mode of the CAN transceiver the signal “DO_CANx_STB” shall be used. Note: “High” -> standby mode “Low” -> normal mode. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_19870 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
